mapper.sql: task.ID_ as taskId, pl_cc.id as consultId, project.id as projectId, project.`code` as projectCode, project.project_name AS projectName, process.process_instance_id as processInstanceId, task.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as processStateCode, sdd.item_code as currentProcessItemCode, sdd.item_value as currentProcessStateCode, pl_cc.name as customerName, assignee.name as executor, pl_cc.business_origin as businessOrigin, pbr.financial_advisers as financialAdvisers, CASE pbr.project_belongs WHEN 1 THEN '赚赚自有' WHEN 2 THEN '报单机构' WHEN 3 THEN '报单个人' ELSE '' END businessOriginText,/*来源*/ pbr.institution_name as institutionName,/*机构名称*/ pbr.salesman as customerManager,/*报单人*/ manager.name as name

INNER JOIN pub_project_process as process on process.process_instance_id=task.PROC_INST_ID_ and process.process_type='0' INNER JOIN pub_project as project on project.id=process.project_id INNER JOIN pl_consult as pl_cc ON pl_cc.process_instance_id=process.process_instance_id INNER JOIN sys_role r on r.nid = task.DESCRIPTION_ LEFT JOIN sys_dict_detail as sdd on sdd.item_code = pl_cc.`status` INNER JOIN sys_user as assignee ON assignee.user_name = task.ASSIGNEE_ INNER JOIN sys_user as manager ON manager.id = pl_cc.customer_manager INNER JOIN pl_borrow_requirement pbr ON pbr.process_instance_id = pl_cc.process_instance_id

if.test: userName !=null or roleId !=null or coverdOffices != null

mapper.select:
select * from( select pl_cc.create_time as declarationDate,
,CASE plpc.type WHEN 'back' THEN '驳回' WHEN 'backCheckBank' THEN '驳回' ELSE '正常' END dataType/*数据类型*/ from ACT_RU_TASK task
left join pub_loanprocess plpc on plpc.new_task_id = task.ID_
order by task.CREATE_TIME_ desc) consult
order by consult.startTime ASC

select * from( select pl_cc.create_time as declarationDate,
,suser.name as nextAssignee ,pub.workflow_next_assignee_name as workflowNextAssigneeName from ACT_HI_TASKINST task
LEFT JOIN pub_loanprocess pub on pub.task_id = task.ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_user suser on suser.user_name = pub.next_assignee
and project.id not in (select projectId from pub_repayloaninfo where repayment_status = 1)
order by task.END_TIME_ desc) consult
order by consult.endTime DESC
